Text: RE Mailing addressSherri Its great hearing from you Really enjoyed meeting you at the Inauguration and must apologize for not having communicated that to you before this I had forgotten about the photoam dying to see it My address is North Sheridan Road Unit C Chicago Illinois You are very kind to contact me on this Thank Jeff for his thoughtfulness on this I had a wonderful time see Jeff and Jeffrey and meeting you your husband Rebecca and many others from Enron What a nice group all of you are Hope all is well and give my best to Jeff Tom Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April AM To Skilling Tom Subject Mailing address Importance High Greetings Tom I have a great picture of you Jeff and Jeffrey at the Inauguration that Jeff asked me to send to you Unfortunately I dont have a mailing address for you If you would please email me your address Ill get the picture right out to you Thanks and hope all is well SRS
